name: The Road 2 Police Business
description:
Summary:
In this LowRes-Police-Racing-Game you take your cop-car on the road to get to some serious police business!!
Experience digitised graphics and an blazing original soundtrack in full 64X64 resolution AND stereo sound!!

Controls:
Press the spacebar to start.. 
Use left and right arrow keys to control the car!

Credits:
Graphics and Animation: Renga
Programming: Renga
Music and Sound-Effects: Renga
LiveAction acting: Renga
Play testing: Maartje
